. /* All required Stata packages are available in the /libraries/stata folder
> tokenize `"$S_ADO"', parse(";")
> while `"`1'"' != "" {

>   macro shift

. * Create directories for output files
. cap mkdir "$working_ANALYSIS/results"

. cap mkdir "$working_ANALYSIS/results/intermediate"

. cap mkdir "$working_ANALYSIS/results/tables"

. cap mkdir "$working_ANALYSIS/results/figures"

. * -------------------------------------------------
. 
. * Set general graph style
. set scheme swift_red // select one scheme as reference scheme to work with

. 
. 
. grstyle init 

. {
. *Background color
. grstyle set color white: background plotregion graphregion legend box textbox /
> /
. 
. *Main colors (note: swift_red only defines 8 colors. Multiplying the color, tha
> t is "xx yy zz*0.5" reduces/increases intensity and "xx yy zz%50" reduces trans
> parency)
. grstyle set color       "100 143 255" "120 94 240" "220 38 127" "254 97 0" "255
>  176 0" /// 5 main colors
>                                         "100 143 255*0.4" "120 94 240*0.4" "220
>  38 127*0.4" "254 97 0*0.4" "255 176 0*0.4" ///
>                                         "100 143 255*1.7" "120 94 240*1.7" "220
>  38 127*1.7" "254 97 0*1.7" "255 176 0*1.7" ///
>                                         : p# p#line p#lineplot p#bar p#area p#a
> realine p#pie histogram 
. 
. *margins
. grstyle set compact
. 
. *Font size
. grstyle set size 10pt: heading //titles
. grstyle set size 8pt: subheading axis_title //axis titles
. grstyle set size 8pt: p#label p#boxlabel body small_body text_option axis_label
>  tick_label minortick_label key_label //all other text
. 
. }

. * -------------------------------------------------
. 
. 
end of do-file

. // Figure Settings

. // Fig 1a: Distribution of answers towards technological optimism items
. ** Catplot for each item

. mylabels 0(25)100, myscale(@) local(pctlabel) suffix("%") // set label for axis

> er equipped to deal" "with adverse impacts of climate change." $pos_text2 "{it:
> .46}", size($textsize) place(w) just(right)) stack percent asyvar yla(`pctlabel
> ', nogrid)  title("") bargap(0) blabel(bar, size(medium) format(%9.0f) pos(cent
> er)) l1title("")  b1title("") legend(rows(1) pos(6) ring(1) size(vsmall)) plotr
> egion(margin(zero)) graphregion(margin($margins)) yscale(off) fysize($fysize)

. // Fig 1b
. ** Global carbon price and temperature rise 
. * Global Generate variable defining position of observations on x-axis
. egen carbon_price_rank = rank(carbon_price_cap), by(temp_rise_cropped) unique

. egen temp_rise_cropped_freq = count(carbon_price_cap), by(temp_rise_cropped)

. gen  temp_rise_cropped_jitter2 = temp_rise_cropped + (carbon_price_rank *.006) 
> - (temp_rise_cropped_freq / 2 * 0.006)

. 
. * National: Generate variable defining position of observations on x-axis
. foreach var in now future {
  2. egen price_rank_h_`var' = rank(price_home_`var'_cap), unique
  3. }

. 
. gen h_now_jitter = .
(276 missing values generated)

. replace h_now_jitter = .5 + (price_rank_h_now *.001)
(276 real changes made)

. gen h_future_jitter = .
(276 missing values generated)

. replace h_future_jitter = 1 + (price_rank_h_future * .001)
(276 real changes made)

. gen h_now_stat = .
(276 missing values generated)

. replace h_now_stat = .6
(276 real changes made)

. gen h_future_stat = .
(276 missing values generated)

. replace h_future_stat = 1.1
(276 real changes made)

. 
. 
. * Save number of observations in locals
. forvalues i = 1/6 {
  2. sum ln_carbon_price if tr`i' == 1
  3. local n_`i' = r(N)
  4. }

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         22    3.323065    2.261287          0   7.601402

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         36    3.722019    2.127395   .6931472   7.601402

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         42    4.207788    1.800718   1.098612   7.601402

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |        115    4.116706    1.364998          0   7.313887

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         40    3.659859    1.407166          0   6.552508

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         21    3.544467    1.325008   .6931472   6.908755

. twoway ///
> (scatter carbon_price_cap temp_rise_cropped_jitter2 , mcolor(%30) msize(medium)
>  msymbol(o)) ///
> (scatter mean_carbon_price temp_rise_cropped , mcolor("119 94 239") mlcolor("94
>  64 201")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(triangle))                           ///
> (scatter median_carbon_price temp_rise_cropped , mcolor("220 38 127") mlcolor("
> 208 17 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                           ///
> , title("{bf:b }", pos(11) span size($head pt))                                
>              ///
> ytitle("Global carbon price to stay below" "stated temperat. target (USD/tCO2)"
> , size($xytitle pt))                               ///
> ylabel(, labsize($xylab pt))                                                   
>              ///
> xtitle("Temperature rise deemed acceptable (°C)", size($xytitle pt)  margin(0 0
>  0 4))       ///
> xlabel(1 `" "0°C" "(n=`n_1')" "' 2 `" "0.5°C" "(n=`n_2')" "'  3 `" "1°C" "(n=`n
> _3')" "' 4 `" "1.5°C" "(n=`n_4')" "' 5 `" "2°C" "(n=`n_5')" "' 6 `" "{&ge}2.5°C
> " "(n=`n_6')" "' , labsize(2.1 pt))                                         ///
> xscale(range(0.85 6.2 )) ///
> legend(order(1 "Observation" 2 "Mean" 3 "Median") size($legend pt) rows(1) pos(
> 6) ring(1) region(fcolor(%40))) ///
> fysize(45) fxsize(40) scale(*1.25) graphregion(margin(0 0 0 0) fcolor(none) lco
> lor(none)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0)) 

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\price_temprise", replace
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia
> _Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis\results\intermediate\price_temprise.gph 
> saved)

> bol(o))  ///
> (scatter mean_price_home_now h_now_stat , mcolor("119 94 239") mlcolor("94 64 2

> 7 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                        ///

> ) msymbol(o)) ///

> 4 64 201")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(triangle))                  ///

> "208 17 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                  ///

> e($xytitle pt))            ///

> legend(off) ///
> fysize(45) fxsize(20) scale(*1.25) graphregion(margin(6 0 0 0) fcolor(none) lco
> lor(none)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0)) nodraw

. // Fig. 1c. Marginsplot global carbon price and home carbon price deemed necess
> ary 
. * Set globals
. global info_source info_cc_1 info_cc_2 info_cc_3 info_cc_4 info_cc_5

. global socioeconomics edu1 edu3 edu4 edu5 // Education ref. cat.: edu2 (Social 
> Sciences); gender and age erased to not jepardize anonimity of participants

. global orga orga2 orga3 orga4 // Governmental organization ref. cat.

. global countryspecifics lower_middle_income upper_middle_income high_income // 
> Income level: ref.cat: low

. 
. 
. * Probit, DV: Global carbon price 
. quietly: probit price_below temp_above tech_ms_pca $info_source $orga cops_atte
> nded $socioeconomics i.income , vce(robust)

. eststo p1: margins, dydx(tech_ms_pca) post

Average marginal effects                        Number of obs     =        276
Model VCE    : Robust

Expression   : Pr(price_below), predict()
dy/dx w.r.t. : tech_ms_pca

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             |            Delta-method
             |      dy/dx   Std. Err.      z    P>|z|     [95% Conf. Interval]
-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------
 tech_ms_pca |   .0572576   .0206221     2.78   0.005      .016839    .0976762
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Probit, DV: Carbon price home now
. quietly: probit price_below_home_now temp_above tech_ms_pca $info_source $orga 
> cops_attended $socioeconomics i.income , vce(robust)

. eststo p2: margins, dydx(tech_ms_pca) post

Average marginal effects                        Number of obs     =        276
Model VCE    : Robust

Expression   : Pr(price_below_home_now), predict()
dy/dx w.r.t. : tech_ms_pca

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             |            Delta-method
             |      dy/dx   Std. Err.      z    P>|z|     [95% Conf. Interval]
-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------
 tech_ms_pca |   .0577999   .0173871     3.32   0.001     .0237219     .091878
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Probit, DV: Carbon price home now
. quietly: probit price_below_home_future temp_above tech_ms_pca $info_source $or
> ga cops_attended $socioeconomics i.income , vce(robust)

. eststo p3: margins, dydx(tech_ms_pca) post

Average marginal effects                        Number of obs     =        276
Model VCE    : Robust

Expression   : Pr(price_below_home_future), predict()
dy/dx w.r.t. : tech_ms_pca

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             |            Delta-method
             |      dy/dx   Std. Err.      z    P>|z|     [95% Conf. Interval]
-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------
 tech_ms_pca |   .0429519   .0206146     2.08   0.037      .002548    .0833558
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Marginsplot
. coefplot(p1, offset(-0.3)) (p2, offset(0)) (p3, offset(.3)), legend(order(3 "Av
> erage marginal effect" 1 "95% Confidence interval" 2 "90% Confidence interval")
>  size($legend pt) rows(3) rowgap(tiny) pos(6) ring(1) region(fcolor(%40))) titl
> e("{bf:c} ", pos(11) span size($head pt))  byopts(compact rows(1)) yline(0, lpa
> ttern(dash) lcolor(gs3)) ylabel(-.02(.02).1, labsize($xylab pt)) xlab(.7 "Globa
> l" 1 "National now" 1.3 "National future", labsize($xylab pt)) ytitle("Estimate
> d impact: Tech. optimism" "and proposing carbon price < 60USD", size($xytitle p
> t)) grid(none) levels(95 90) ciopts(lwidth(0.8 2)  lcolor(*1 *.3) recast(rcap))
>  mlabel(cond(@pval<.01, "***", cond(@pval<.05, "**", cond(@pval<.1, "*", ""))))
>  msize(3pt) msymbol(D) mlabsize(10pt) mlabposition(2) subtitle(, size(9pt) lsty
> le(none) margin(small) nobox justification(center) alignment(top) bmargin(top))
>  vertical graphregion(margin(18 0 0 -5) fcolor(none) lcolor(none)) plotregion(m
> argin(0 0 0 0)) scale(*1.25) fysize(80) 
(note:  named style thin not found in class linestyle, default attributes used)

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.xaxis1.major.num_rule_ticks = 0

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.xaxis1.edit_tick 2 1 `""National"
>  "now""', tickset(major) editstyle(tickstyle(textstyle(color("87 64 92"))) tick
> style(textstyle(size(2.2))))

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.xaxis1.major.num_rule_ticks = 0

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.xaxis1.edit_tick 3 1.3 `""Nationa
> l" "future""', custom tickset(major) editstyle(tickstyle(textstyle(color("87 64
>  92"))) tickstyle(textstyle(size(2.2))) )

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.plotregion1.plot8.style.editstyle
>  area(linestyle(color("255 220 184"))) editcopy

>  area(linestyle(color("255 128 0"))) editcopy

>  marker(fillcolor("255 128 0")) editcopy

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph2.xaxis1.title.DragBy 1.2 0

. * Marginsplot
. coefplot(p1, offset(-0.3)) (p2, offset(0)) (p3, offset(.3)), legend(order(3 "Av
> erage marginal effect" 1 "95% Confidence interval" 2 "90% Confidence interval")
>  size($legend pt) rows(3) rowgap(tiny) pos(6) ring(1) region(fcolor(%40))) titl
> e("{bf:c} ", pos(11) span size($head pt))  byopts(compact rows(1)) yline(0, lpa
> ttern(dash) lcolor(gs3)) ylabel(-.02(.02).1, labsize($xylab pt)) xlab(.7 "Globa
> l" 1 "National now" 1.3 "National future", labsize($xylab pt)) ytitle("Estimate
> d impact: Tech. optimism" "and proposing carbon price < 60USD", size($xytitle p
> t)) grid(none) levels(95 90) ciopts(lwidth(0.8 2)  lcolor(*1 *.3) recast(rcap))
>  mlabel(cond(@pval<.01, "***", cond(@pval<.05, "**", cond(@pval<.1, "*", ""))))
>  msize(3pt) msymbol(D) mlabsize(10pt) mlabposition(2) subtitle(, size(9pt) lsty
> le(none) margin(small) nobox justification(center) alignment(top) bmargin(top))
>  vertical graphregion(margin(18 0 0 0) fcolor(none) lcolor(none)) plotregion(ma
> rgin(0 0 0 0)) scale(*1.25) fysize(80) 

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\margins_temp_price", replace
>

> lor(none)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0)) nodraw

> ermediate\margins_temp_price", rows(1) fysize(50)
(note:  named style thin not found in class linestyle, default attributes used)

. gr save "$working_ANALYSIS/results/intermediate/figure1_bc.gph", replace
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia
> _Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis/results/intermediate/figure1_bc.gph save
> d)

. // Combine graph a with b&c
. graph combine "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\tech_opt_answers" "$worki
> ng_ANALYSIS/results/intermediate/figure1_bc.gph" , rows(2) ysize(5) graphregion
> (margin(b=0))
(note:  named style thin not found in class linestyle, default attributes used)

. do "C:\Users\MAXBUR~1\AppData\Local\Temp\STD3f28_000000.tmp"

. 
. * Save number of observations in locals
. forvalues i = 1/6 {
  2. sum ln_carbon_price if tr`i' == 1
  3. local n_`i' = r(N)
  4. }

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         22    3.323065    2.261287          0   7.601402

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         36    3.722019    2.127395   .6931472   7.601402

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         42    4.207788    1.800718   1.098612   7.601402

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |        115    4.116706    1.364998          0   7.313887

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         40    3.659859    1.407166          0   6.552508

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         21    3.544467    1.325008   .6931472   6.908755

. twoway ///
> (scatter carbon_price_cap temp_rise_cropped_jitter2 , mcolor(%30) msize(medium)
>  msymbol(o)) ///
> (scatter mean_carbon_price temp_rise_cropped , mcolor("119 94 239") mlcolor("94
>  64 201")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(triangle))                           ///
> (scatter median_carbon_price temp_rise_cropped , mcolor("220 38 127") mlcolor("
> 208 17 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                           ///
> , title("{bf:b }", pos(11) span size($head pt))                                
>              ///
> ytitle("Global carbon price to stay below" "stated temperat. target (USD/tCO2)"
> , size($xytitle pt))                               ///
> ylabel(, labsize($xylab pt))                                                   
>              ///
> xtitle("Temperature rise deemed acceptable (°C)", size($xytitle pt)  margin(0 0
>  0 4))       ///
> xlabel(1 `" "0°C" "(n=`n_1')" "' 2 `" "0.5°C" "(n=`n_2')" "'  3 `" "1°C" "(n=`n
> _3')" "' 4 `" "1.5°C" "(n=`n_4')" "' 5 `" "2°C" "(n=`n_5')" "' 6 `" "{&ge}2.5°C
> " "(n=`n_6')" "' , labsize(2.1 pt))                                         ///
> xscale(range(0.85 6.2 )) ///
> legend(order(1 "Observation" 2 "Mean" 3 "Median") size($legend pt) rows(1) pos(
> 6) ring(1) region(fcolor(%40))) ///
> fysize(45) fxsize(40) scale(*1.25) graphregion(margin(0 0 1 0) fcolor(none) lco
> lor(none)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0)) 

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\price_temprise", replace
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia
> _Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis\results\intermediate\price_temprise.gph 
> saved)

. 
. 
. * National carbon prices home (now/future)
. twoway ///
> (scatter price_home_now_cap h_now_jitter , mcolor(purple%30) msize(medium) msym
> bol(o))  ///
> (scatter mean_price_home_now h_now_stat , mcolor("119 94 239") mlcolor("94 64 2
> 01")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(triangle))                    ///
> (scatter median_price_home_now h_now_stat , mcolor("220 38 127") mlcolor("208 1
> 7 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                        ///
> (scatter price_home_future_cap h_future_jitter , mcolor(orange%30) msize(medium
> ) msymbol(o)) ///
> (scatter mean_price_home_future h_future_stat , mcolor("119 94 239") mlcolor("9
> 4 64 201")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(triangle))                  ///
> (scatter median_price_home_future h_future_stat , mcolor("220 38 127") mlcolor(
> "208 17 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                  ///
> , title("{bf: }", pos(11) span size($head pt))                                 
>   ///
> ytitle("National carbon price to stay below" "2°C temp. target (USD/tCO2)", siz
> e($xytitle pt))            ///
> ylabel(, labsize($xylab pt)) yscale(alt) ///
> xtitle("Time period", size($xytitle pt)  margin(0 0 0 4)) ///
> xlabel(.6 "Now" 1.1 "Future", labsize(8 pt)) xscale(range(0.47 1.3)) ///
> legend(off) ///
> fysize(45) fxsize(20) scale(*1.25) graphregion(margin(6 0 12.2 3.5) fcolor(none
> ) lcolor(none)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0)) nodraw

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\global_price", replace
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia
> _Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis\results\intermediate\global_price.gph sa
> ved)

. 
. 
. 
. // Combine graph b & c
. graph combine "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\price_temprise" "$working
> _ANALYSIS/results/intermediate/global_price.gph" "$working_ANALYSIS\results\int
> ermediate\margins_temp_price", rows(1) fysize(50)
(note:  named style thin not found in class linestyle, default attributes used)

> e("{bf:c} ", pos(11) span size($head pt))  byopts(compact rows(1)) yline(0, lpa
> ttern(dash) lcolor(gs3)) ylabel(-.02(.02).1, labsize($xylab pt)) xlab(.7 "Globa
> l" 1 "National now" 1.3 "National future", labsize($xylab pt)) ytitle("Estimate

> ng_ANALYSIS/results/intermediate/figure1_bc.gph" , rows(2) ysize(5) graphregion
> (margin(b=0))
(note:  named style thin not found in class linestyle, default attributes used)

. 
. 
. 
. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.xaxis1.major.num_rule_ticks = 0

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.xaxis1.edit_tick 2 1 `""National"
>  "now""', tickset(major) editstyle(tickstyle(textstyle(color("87 64 92"))) tick
> style(textstyle(size(2.2))))

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.xaxis1.major.num_rule_ticks = 0

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.xaxis1.edit_tick 3 1.3 `""Nationa
> l" "future""', custom tickset(major) editstyle(tickstyle(textstyle(color("87 64
>  92"))) tickstyle(textstyle(size(2.2))) )

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.plotregion1.plot8.style.editstyle
>  area(linestyle(color("255 220 184"))) editcopy

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.plotregion1.plot7.style.editstyle
>  area(linestyle(color("255 128 0"))) editcopy

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.plotregion1.plot9.style.editstyle
>  marker(fillcolor("255 128 0")) editcopy

. 
. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.style.editstyle margin(18 0 1 0) 
> editcopy

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.yoffset = -2.4 // Graph C: offset
>  y

. 
. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph1.yaxis1.title.DragBy 0 -1

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph1.legend.plotregion1.DragBy 0 9

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph2.xaxis1.title.DragBy 1.2 0

. gr save "$working_ANALYSIS/results/intermediate/Figure 1", replace

> _Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis/results/intermediate/Figure 1.gph saved)

. * Save number of observations in locals
. forvalues i = 1/6 {
  2. sum ln_carbon_price if tr`i' == 1
  3. local n_`i' = r(N)
  4. }

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         21    3.544467    1.325008   .6931472   6.908755

. twoway ///
> (scatter carbon_price_cap temp_rise_cropped_jitter2 , mcolor(%30) msize(medium)
>  msymbol(o)) ///
> (scatter mean_carbon_price temp_rise_cropped , mcolor("119 94 239") mlcolor("94
>  64 201")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(triangle))                           ///
> (scatter median_carbon_price temp_rise_cropped , mcolor("220 38 127") mlcolor("
> 208 17 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                           ///
> , title("{bf:b }", pos(11) span size($head pt))                                
>              ///
> ytitle("Global carbon price to stay below" "stated temperat. target (USD/tCO2)"
> , size($xytitle pt))                               ///
> ylabel(, labsize($xylab pt))                                                   
>              ///
> xtitle("Temperature rise deemed acceptable (°C)", size($xytitle pt)  margin(0 0
>  0 4))       ///
> xlabel(1 `" "0°C" "(n=`n_1')" "' 2 `" "0.5°C" "(n=`n_2')" "'  3 `" "1°C" "(n=`n
> _3')" "' 4 `" "1.5°C" "(n=`n_4')" "' 5 `" "2°C" "(n=`n_5')" "' 6 `" "{&ge}2.5°C
> " "(n=`n_6')" "' , labsize(2.1 pt))                                         ///
> xscale(range(0.85 6.2 )) ///
> legend(order(1 "Observation" 2 "Mean" 3 "Median") size($legend pt) rows(1) pos(
> 6) ring(1) region(fcolor(%40))) ///
> fysize(45) fxsize(40) scale(*1.25) graphregion(margin(0 0 1.3 .8) fcolor(none) 
> lcolor(none)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0)) 

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\price_temprise", replace
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia
> _Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis\results\intermediate\price_temprise.gph 
> saved)

. * National carbon prices home (now/future)
. twoway ///
> (scatter price_home_now_cap h_now_jitter , mcolor(purple%30) msize(medium) msym
> bol(o))  ///
> (scatter mean_price_home_now h_now_stat , mcolor("119 94 239") mlcolor("94 64 2
> 01")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(triangle))                    ///
> (scatter median_price_home_now h_now_stat , mcolor("220 38 127") mlcolor("208 1
> 7 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                        ///
> (scatter price_home_future_cap h_future_jitter , mcolor(orange%30) msize(medium
> ) msymbol(o)) ///
> (scatter mean_price_home_future h_future_stat , mcolor("119 94 239") mlcolor("9
> 4 64 201")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(triangle))                  ///
> (scatter median_price_home_future h_future_stat , mcolor("220 38 127") mlcolor(
> "208 17 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                  ///
> , title("{bf: }", pos(11) span size($head pt))                                 
>   ///
> ytitle("National carbon price to stay below" "2°C temp. target (USD/tCO2)", siz
> e($xytitle pt))            ///
> ylabel(, labsize($xylab pt)) yscale(alt) ///
> xtitle("Time period", size($xytitle pt)  margin(0 0 0 4)) ///
> xlabel(.6 "Now" 1.1 "Future", labsize(8 pt)) xscale(range(0.47 1.3)) ///
> legend(off) ///
> fysize(45) fxsize(20) scale(*1.25) graphregion(margin(6 0 13.3 4.4) fcolor(none
> ) lcolor(none)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0)) nodraw

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\global_price", replace
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia
> _Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis\results\intermediate\global_price.gph sa
> ved)

. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. // Fig. 1c. Marginsplot global carbon price and home carbon price deemed necess
> ary 
. * Set globals
. global info_source info_cc_1 info_cc_2 info_cc_3 info_cc_4 info_cc_5

. global socioeconomics edu1 edu3 edu4 edu5 // Education ref. cat.: edu2 (Social 
> Sciences); gender and age erased to not jepardize anonimity of participants

. global orga orga2 orga3 orga4 // Governmental organization ref. cat.

. global countryspecifics lower_middle_income upper_middle_income high_income // 
> Income level: ref.cat: low

. 
. 
. * Probit, DV: Global carbon price 
. quietly: probit price_below temp_above tech_ms_pca $info_source $orga cops_atte
> nded $socioeconomics i.income , vce(robust)

. eststo p1: margins, dydx(tech_ms_pca) post

Average marginal effects                        Number of obs     =        276
Model VCE    : Robust

Expression   : Pr(price_below), predict()
dy/dx w.r.t. : tech_ms_pca

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             |            Delta-method
             |      dy/dx   Std. Err.      z    P>|z|     [95% Conf. Interval]
-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------
 tech_ms_pca |   .0572576   .0206221     2.78   0.005      .016839    .0976762
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Probit, DV: Carbon price home now
. quietly: probit price_below_home_now temp_above tech_ms_pca $info_source $orga 
> cops_attended $socioeconomics i.income , vce(robust)

. eststo p2: margins, dydx(tech_ms_pca) post

Average marginal effects                        Number of obs     =        276
Model VCE    : Robust

Expression   : Pr(price_below_home_now), predict()
dy/dx w.r.t. : tech_ms_pca

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             |            Delta-method
             |      dy/dx   Std. Err.      z    P>|z|     [95% Conf. Interval]
-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------
 tech_ms_pca |   .0577999   .0173871     3.32   0.001     .0237219     .091878
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Probit, DV: Carbon price home now
. quietly: probit price_below_home_future temp_above tech_ms_pca $info_source $or
> ga cops_attended $socioeconomics i.income , vce(robust)

. eststo p3: margins, dydx(tech_ms_pca) post

Average marginal effects                        Number of obs     =        276
Model VCE    : Robust

Expression   : Pr(price_below_home_future), predict()
dy/dx w.r.t. : tech_ms_pca

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             |            Delta-method
             |      dy/dx   Std. Err.      z    P>|z|     [95% Conf. Interval]
-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------
 tech_ms_pca |   .0429519   .0206146     2.08   0.037      .002548    .0833558
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Marginsplot
. coefplot(p1, offset(-0.3)) (p2, offset(0)) (p3, offset(.3)), legend(order(3 "Av
> erage marginal effect" 1 "95% Confidence interval" 2 "90% Confidence interval")
>  size($legend pt) rows(3) rowgap(tiny) pos(6) ring(1) region(fcolor(%40))) titl
> e("{bf:c} ", pos(11) span size($head pt))  byopts(compact rows(1)) yline(0, lpa
> ttern(dash) lcolor(gs3)) ylabel(-.02(.02).1, labsize($xylab pt)) xlab(.7 "Globa
> l" 1 "National now" 1.3 "National future", labsize($xylab pt)) ytitle("Estimate
> d impact: Tech. optimism" "and proposing carbon price < 60USD", size($xytitle p
> t)) grid(none) levels(95 90) ciopts(lwidth(0.8 2)  lcolor(*1 *.3) recast(rcap))
>  mlabel(cond(@pval<.01, "***", cond(@pval<.05, "**", cond(@pval<.1, "*", ""))))
>  msize(3pt) msymbol(D) mlabsize(10pt) mlabposition(2) subtitle(, size(9pt) lsty
> le(none) margin(small) nobox justification(center) alignment(top) bmargin(top))
>  vertical graphregion(margin(18 0 0 0) fcolor(none) lcolor(none)) plotregion(ma
> rgin(0 0 0 0)) scale(*1.25) fysize(80) 

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\margins_temp_price", replace
>  
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia
> _Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis\results\intermediate\margins_temp_price.
> gph saved)

.

             |      dy/dx   Std. Err.      z    P>|z|     [95% Conf. Interval]
-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------
 tech_ms_pca |   .0429519   .0206146     2.08   0.037      .002548    .0833558
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Marginsplot
. coefplot(p1, offset(-0.3)) (p2, offset(0)) (p3, offset(.3)), legend(order(3 "Av
> erage marginal effect" 1 "95% Confidence interval" 2 "90% Confidence interval")
>  size($legend pt) rows(3) rowgap(tiny) pos(6) ring(1) region(fcolor(%40))) titl
> e("{bf:c} ", pos(11) span size($head pt))  byopts(compact rows(1)) yline(0, lpa
> ttern(dash) lcolor(gs3)) ylabel(-.02(.02).1, labsize($xylab pt)) xlab(.7 "Globa
> l" 1 "National now" 1.3 "National future", labsize($xylab pt)) ytitle("Estimate
> d impact: Tech. optimism" "and proposing carbon price < 60USD", size($xytitle p
> t)) grid(none) levels(95 90) ciopts(lwidth(0.8 2)  lcolor(*1 *.3) recast(rcap))
>  mlabel(cond(@pval<.01, "***", cond(@pval<.05, "**", cond(@pval<.1, "*", ""))))
>  msize(3pt) msymbol(D) mlabsize(10pt) mlabposition(2) subtitle(, size(9pt) lsty
> le(none) margin(small) nobox justification(center) alignment(top) bmargin(top))
>  vertical graphregion(margin(18 0 0 0) fcolor(none) lcolor(none)) plotregion(ma
> rgin(0 0 0 0)) scale(*1.25) fysize(80)

> owgap(tiny) pos(6) ring(1) region(fcolor(%40))) title("{bf:c} ", pos(11) span size($head pt))  byopts(compact rows(1)) yline(0, lpattern(dash) lcolor(gs3)) ylabel(-.02(.02).1, labsize($
> xylab pt)) xlab(.7 "Global" 1 "National now" 1.3 "National future", labsize($xylab pt)) ytitle("Estimated impact: Tech. optimism" "and proposing carbon price < 60USD", size($xytitle pt)
> ) grid(none) levels(95 90) ciopts(lwidth(0.8 2)  lcolor(*1 *.3) recast(rcap)) mlabel(cond(@pval<.01, "***", cond(@pval<.05, "**", cond(@pval<.1, "*", "")))) msize(3pt) msymbol(D) mlabsi
> ze(10pt) mlabposition(2) subtitle(, size(9pt) lstyle(none) margin(small) nobox justification(center) alignment(top) bmargin(top)) vertical graphregion(margin(15 3 0 0) fcolor(none) lcol
> or(none)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0)) scale(*1.25) fysize(80)

. /*
> Main Body:
> I)  Fig. 1: Descriptives
>         a) Carbon price and temperature rise
>         b) Shifting the burden
> 
> II) Fig. 2: Inferential
>         a) Answers towards technological optimism items
>         b) Technological optimism mindset and temperature & prices suggested
> 
> III) In text-statistics not mentioned in the supplementary online material
>     - "Delegates vastly agree to limit global warming: The majority perceives a rise above 1.5°C unacceptable (78%), with only few (8%) deeming an increase of 2.5°C or more acceptable."
>     - "The median global carbon price recommended in our sample is 50 USD [...]"
>     - "Roughly half of all delegates interviewed stated rather unambitious carbon prices below 60 USD (55%). Only 37% (19% and 13%, respectively) deemed a price of at least 82 USD (185 
> USD, 281 USD) as appropriate"
>     - "This variance in global price suggested is highest for the three low temperature options (0°C, 0.5°C and 1°C), with price suggestions ranging from 0 to 2,000 USD (Levene’s test F
> (1, 275)=21.7, p<0.001)."
>     - "Of the 100 delegates [suggesting prices between 0°C und 1°C] in favor of these ambitious temperature targets, 62% indicated global carbon prices below 60 USD as appropriate to st
> ay below the temperature target."
>     - "In addition, we find that participants who claim to be influential in their delegation score higher on the technological optimism mindset (r=.23, p<.001)."
> */
. 
. 
. 
. global working_ANALYSIS "C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia_Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis"

. 
. 
. // REPLACE WITH _analysis for upload!!
. use "$working_ANALYSIS\data\delegates_analysis_complete.dta", clear

. // Figure Settings
. * Text size

0 "0%" 25 "25%" 50 "50%" 75 "75%" 100 "100%"

> e(w) just(right)) stack percent asyvar yla(`pctlabel', nogrid)  title("") bargap(0) blabel(bar, size(medium) format(%9.0f) pos(center)) l1title("")  b1title("") legend(rows(1) pos(6) ri
> ng(1) size(vsmall)) plotregion(margin(zero)) graphregion(margin($margins)) yscale(off) fysize($fysize)

. graph export "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\1a_tech_opt_answers.tif", replace
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia_Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis\results\intermediate\1a_tech_opt_answers.tif written in TIFF format
> )

. // Fig 1b
. ** Global carbon price and temperature rise 
. * Global Generate variable defining position of observations on x-axis
. egen carbon_price_rank = rank(carbon_price_cap), by(temp_rise_cropped) unique

. egen temp_rise_cropped_freq = count(carbon_price_cap), by(temp_rise_cropped)

. gen  temp_rise_cropped_jitter2 = temp_rise_cropped + (carbon_price_rank *.006) - (temp_rise_cropped_freq / 2 * 0.006)

. 
. * National: Generate variable defining position of observations on x-axis
. foreach var in now future {
  2. egen price_rank_h_`var' = rank(price_home_`var'_cap), unique
  3. }

. 
. gen h_now_jitter = .
(276 missing values generated)

. replace h_now_jitter = .5 + (price_rank_h_now *.001)
(276 real changes made)

. gen h_future_jitter = .
(276 missing values generated)

. replace h_future_jitter = 1 + (price_rank_h_future * .001)
(276 real changes made)

. gen h_now_stat = .
(276 missing values generated)

. replace h_now_stat = .6
(276 real changes made)

. gen h_future_stat = .
(276 missing values generated)

. replace h_future_stat = 1.1
(276 real changes made)

. 
. 
. * Save number of observations in locals
. forvalues i = 1/6 {
  2. sum ln_carbon_price if tr`i' == 1
  3. local n_`i' = r(N)
  4. }

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         22    3.323065    2.261287          0   7.601402

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         36    3.722019    2.127395   .6931472   7.601402

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         42    4.207788    1.800718   1.098612   7.601402

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |        115    4.116706    1.364998          0   7.313887

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         40    3.659859    1.407166          0   6.552508

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         21    3.544467    1.325008   .6931472   6.908755

. twoway ///
> (scatter carbon_price_cap temp_rise_cropped_jitter2 , mcolor(%30) msize(medium) msymbol(o)) ///
> (scatter mean_carbon_price temp_rise_cropped , mcolor("119 94 239") mlcolor("94 64 201")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(triangle))                           ///
> (scatter median_carbon_price temp_rise_cropped , mcolor("220 38 127") mlcolor("208 17 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                           ///
> , title("{bf:b }", pos(11) span size($head pt))                                             ///
> ytitle("Global carbon price to stay below" "stated temperat. target (USD/tCO2)", size($xytitle pt))                               ///
> ylabel(, labsize($xylab pt))                                                                ///
> xtitle("Temperature rise deemed acceptable (°C)", size($xytitle pt)  margin(0 0 0 4))       ///
> xlabel(1 `" "0°C" "(n=`n_1')" "' 2 `" "0.5°C" "(n=`n_2')" "'  3 `" "1°C" "(n=`n_3')" "' 4 `" "1.5°C" "(n=`n_4')" "' 5 `" "2°C" "(n=`n_5')" "' 6 `" "{&ge}2.5°C" "(n=`n_6')" "' , labsize(
> 2.1 pt))                                         ///
> xscale(range(0.85 6.2 )) ///
> legend(order(1 "Observation" 2 "Mean" 3 "Median") size($legend pt) rows(1) pos(6) ring(1) region(fcolor(%40))) ///
> fysize(45) fxsize(40) scale(*1.25) graphregion(margin(0 0 1.3 0) fcolor(none) lcolor(none)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0)) 

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\price_temprise", replace
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia_Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis\results\intermediate\price_temprise.gph saved)

. 
. 
. * National carbon prices home (now/future)
. twoway ///
> (scatter price_home_now_cap h_now_jitter , mcolor(purple%30) msize(medium) msymbol(o))  ///
> (scatter mean_price_home_now h_now_stat , mcolor("119 94 239") mlcolor("94 64 201")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(triangle))                    ///
> (scatter median_price_home_now h_now_stat , mcolor("220 38 127") mlcolor("208 17 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                        ///
> (scatter price_home_future_cap h_future_jitter , mcolor(orange%30) msize(medium) msymbol(o)) ///
> (scatter mean_price_home_future h_future_stat , mcolor("119 94 239") mlcolor("94 64 201")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(triangle))                  ///
> (scatter median_price_home_future h_future_stat , mcolor("220 38 127") mlcolor("208 17 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                  ///
> , title("{bf: }", pos(11) span size($head pt))                                   ///
> ytitle("National carbon price to stay below" "2°C temp. target (USD/tCO2)", size($xytitle pt))            ///
> ylabel(, labsize($xylab pt)) yscale(alt) ///
> xtitle("Time period", size($xytitle pt)  margin(0 0 0 4)) ///
> xlabel(.6 "Now" 1.1 "Future", labsize(8 pt)) xscale(range(0.47 1.3)) ///
> legend(off) ///
> fysize(45) fxsize(20) scale(*1.25) graphregion(margin(6 0 13.3 3.6) fcolor(none) lcolor(none)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0)) nodraw

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\global_price", replace
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia_Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis\results\intermediate\global_price.gph saved)

. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. // Fig. 1c. Marginsplot global carbon price and home carbon price deemed necessary 
. * Set globals
. global info_source info_cc_1 info_cc_2 info_cc_3 info_cc_4 info_cc_5

. global socioeconomics edu1 edu3 edu4 edu5 // Education ref. cat.: edu2 (Social Sciences); gender and age erased to not jepardize anonimity of participants

. global orga orga2 orga3 orga4 // Governmental organization ref. cat.

. global countryspecifics lower_middle_income upper_middle_income high_income // Income level: ref.cat: low

. 
. 
. * Probit, DV: Global carbon price 
. quietly: probit price_below temp_above tech_ms_pca $info_source $orga cops_attended $socioeconomics i.income , vce(robust)

. eststo p1: margins, dydx(tech_ms_pca) post

Average marginal effects                        Number of obs     =        276
Model VCE    : Robust

Expression   : Pr(price_below), predict()
dy/dx w.r.t. : tech_ms_pca

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             |            Delta-method
             |      dy/dx   Std. Err.      z    P>|z|     [95% Conf. Interval]
-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------
 tech_ms_pca |   .0572576   .0206221     2.78   0.005      .016839    .0976762
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Probit, DV: Carbon price home now
. quietly: probit price_below_home_now temp_above tech_ms_pca $info_source $orga cops_attended $socioeconomics i.income , vce(robust)

. eststo p2: margins, dydx(tech_ms_pca) post

Average marginal effects                        Number of obs     =        276
Model VCE    : Robust

Expression   : Pr(price_below_home_now), predict()
dy/dx w.r.t. : tech_ms_pca

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             |            Delta-method
             |      dy/dx   Std. Err.      z    P>|z|     [95% Conf. Interval]
-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------
 tech_ms_pca |   .0577999   .0173871     3.32   0.001     .0237219     .091878
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Probit, DV: Carbon price home now
. quietly: probit price_below_home_future temp_above tech_ms_pca $info_source $orga cops_attended $socioeconomics i.income , vce(robust)

. eststo p3: margins, dydx(tech_ms_pca) post

Average marginal effects                        Number of obs     =        276
Model VCE    : Robust

Expression   : Pr(price_below_home_future), predict()
dy/dx w.r.t. : tech_ms_pca

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             |            Delta-method
             |      dy/dx   Std. Err.      z    P>|z|     [95% Conf. Interval]
-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------
 tech_ms_pca |   .0429519   .0206146     2.08   0.037      .002548    .0833558
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Marginsplot
. coefplot(p1, offset(-0.3)) (p2, offset(0)) (p3, offset(.3)), legend(order(3 "Average marginal effect" 1 "95% Confidence interval" 2 "90% Confidence interval") size($legend pt) rows(3) r
> owgap(tiny) pos(6) ring(1) region(fcolor(%40))) title("{bf:c} ", pos(11) span size($head pt))  byopts(compact rows(1)) yline(0, lpattern(dash) lcolor(gs3)) ylabel(-.02(.02).1, labsize($
> xylab pt)) xlab(.7 "Global" 1 "National now" 1.3 "National future", labsize($xylab pt)) ytitle("Estimated impact: Tech. optimism" "and proposing carbon price < 60USD", size($xytitle pt)
> ) grid(none) levels(95 90) ciopts(lwidth(0.8 2)  lcolor(*1 *.3) recast(rcap)) mlabel(cond(@pval<.01, "***", cond(@pval<.05, "**", cond(@pval<.1, "*", "")))) msize(3pt) msymbol(D) mlabsi
> ze(10pt) mlabposition(2) subtitle(, size(9pt) lstyle(none) margin(small) nobox justification(center) alignment(top) bmargin(top)) vertical graphregion(margin(15 2 0 0) fcolor(none) lcol
> or(none)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0)) scale(*1.25) fysize(80) 

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\margins_temp_price", replace 
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia_Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis\results\intermediate\margins_temp_price.gph saved)

.

. /*
> Main Body:
> I)  Fig. 1: Descriptives
>         a) Carbon price and temperature rise
>         b) Shifting the burden
> 
> II) Fig. 2: Inferential
>         a) Answers towards technological optimism items
>         b) Technological optimism mindset and temperature & prices suggested
> 
> III) In text-statistics not mentioned in the supplementary online material
>     - "Delegates vastly agree to limit global warming: The majority perceives a rise above 1.5°C unacceptable (78%), with only few (8%) deeming an increase of 2.5°C or more acceptable."
>     - "The median global carbon price recommended in our sample is 50 USD [...]"
>     - "Roughly half of all delegates interviewed stated rather unambitious carbon prices below 60 USD (55%). Only 37% (19% and 13%, respectively) deemed a price of at least 82 USD (185 
> USD, 281 USD) as appropriate"
>     - "This variance in global price suggested is highest for the three low temperature options (0°C, 0.5°C and 1°C), with price suggestions ranging from 0 to 2,000 USD (Levene’s test F
> (1, 275)=21.7, p<0.001)."
>     - "Of the 100 delegates [suggesting prices between 0°C und 1°C] in favor of these ambitious temperature targets, 62% indicated global carbon prices below 60 USD as appropriate to st
> ay below the temperature target."
>     - "In addition, we find that participants who claim to be influential in their delegation score higher on the technological optimism mindset (r=.23, p<.001)."
> */
. 
. 
. 
. global working_ANALYSIS "C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia_Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis"

. 
.

> ng(1) size(vsmall)) plotregion(margin(zero)) graphregion(margin($margins)) yscale(off) fysize($fysize)

. graph export "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\1a_tech_opt_answers.tif", replace
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia_Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis\results\intermediate\1a_tech_opt_answers.tif written in TIFF format
> )

. // Fig 1b
. ** Global carbon price and temperature rise 
. * Global Generate variable defining position of observations on x-axis
. egen carbon_price_rank = rank(carbon_price_cap), by(temp_rise_cropped) unique

. egen temp_rise_cropped_freq = count(carbon_price_cap), by(temp_rise_cropped)

. gen  temp_rise_cropped_jitter2 = temp_rise_cropped + (carbon_price_rank *.006) - (temp_rise_cropped_freq / 2 * 0.006)

. 
. * National: Generate variable defining position of observations on x-axis
. foreach var in now future {
  2. egen price_rank_h_`var' = rank(price_home_`var'_cap), unique
  3. }

. 
. gen h_now_jitter = .
(276 missing values generated)

. replace h_now_jitter = .5 + (price_rank_h_now *.001)
(276 real changes made)

. gen h_future_jitter = .
(276 missing values generated)

. replace h_future_jitter = 1 + (price_rank_h_future * .001)
(276 real changes made)

. gen h_now_stat = .
(276 missing values generated)

. replace h_now_stat = .6
(276 real changes made)

. gen h_future_stat = .
(276 missing values generated)

. replace h_future_stat = 1.1
(276 real changes made)

. 
. 
. * Save number of observations in locals
. forvalues i = 1/6 {
  2. sum ln_carbon_price if tr`i' == 1
  3. local n_`i' = r(N)
  4. }

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max

. twoway ///
> (scatter carbon_price_cap temp_rise_cropped_jitter2 , mcolor(%30) msize(medium) msymbol(o)) ///
> (scatter mean_carbon_price temp_rise_cropped , mcolor("119 94 239") mlcolor("94 64 201")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(triangle))                           ///
> (scatter median_carbon_price temp_rise_cropped , mcolor("220 38 127") mlcolor("208 17 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                           ///
> , title("{bf:b }", pos(11) span size($head pt))                                             ///
> ytitle("Global carbon price to stay below" "stated temperat. target (USD/tCO2)", size($xytitle pt))                               ///
> ylabel(, labsize($xylab pt))                                                                ///
> xtitle("Temperature rise deemed acceptable (°C)", size($xytitle pt)  margin(0 0 0 4))       ///
> xlabel(1 `" "0°C" "(n=`n_1')" "' 2 `" "0.5°C" "(n=`n_2')" "'  3 `" "1°C" "(n=`n_3')" "' 4 `" "1.5°C" "(n=`n_4')" "' 5 `" "2°C" "(n=`n_5')" "' 6 `" "{&ge}2.5°C" "(n=`n_6')" "' , labsize(
> 2.1 pt))                                         ///
> xscale(range(0.85 6.2 )) ///
> legend(order(1 "Observation" 2 "Mean" 3 "Median") size($legend pt) rows(1) pos(6) ring(1) region(fcolor(%40))) ///
> fysize(45) fxsize(40) scale(*1.25) graphregion(margin(0 0 1.3 0) fcolor(none) lcolor(none)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0)) 

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\price_temprise", replace
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia_Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis\results\intermediate\price_temprise.gph saved)

. * National carbon prices home (now/future)
. twoway ///
> (scatter price_home_now_cap h_now_jitter , mcolor(purple%30) msize(medium) msymbol(o))  ///
> (scatter mean_price_home_now h_now_stat , mcolor("119 94 239") mlcolor("94 64 201")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(triangle))                    ///
> (scatter median_price_home_now h_now_stat , mcolor("220 38 127") mlcolor("208 17 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                        ///
> (scatter price_home_future_cap h_future_jitter , mcolor(orange%30) msize(medium) msymbol(o)) ///
> (scatter mean_price_home_future h_future_stat , mcolor("119 94 239") mlcolor("94 64 201")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(triangle))                  ///
> (scatter median_price_home_future h_future_stat , mcolor("220 38 127") mlcolor("208 17 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                  ///
> , title("{bf: }", pos(11) span size($head pt))                                   ///
> ytitle("National carbon price to stay below" "2°C temp. target (USD/tCO2)", size($xytitle pt))            ///
> ylabel(, labsize($xylab pt)) yscale(alt) ///
> xtitle("Time period", size($xytitle pt)  margin(0 0 0 4)) ///
> xlabel(.6 "Now" 1.1 "Future", labsize(8 pt)) xscale(range(0.47 1.3)) ///
> legend(off) ///
> fysize(45) fxsize(20) scale(*1.25) graphregion(margin(6 0 13.3 3.6) fcolor(none) lcolor(none)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0)) nodraw

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\global_price", replace
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia_Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis\results\intermediate\global_price.gph saved)

. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. // Fig. 1c. Marginsplot global carbon price and home carbon price deemed necessary 
. * Set globals
. global info_source info_cc_1 info_cc_2 info_cc_3 info_cc_4 info_cc_5

. global socioeconomics edu1 edu3 edu4 edu5 // Education ref. cat.: edu2 (Social Sciences); gender and age erased to not jepardize anonimity of participants

. global orga orga2 orga3 orga4 // Governmental organization ref. cat.

. global countryspecifics lower_middle_income upper_middle_income high_income // Income level: ref.cat: low

. 
. 
. * Probit, DV: Global carbon price 
. quietly: probit price_below temp_above tech_ms_pca $info_source $orga cops_attended $socioeconomics i.income , vce(robust)

. eststo p1: margins, dydx(tech_ms_pca) post

Average marginal effects                        Number of obs     =        276
Model VCE    : Robust

Expression   : Pr(price_below), predict()
dy/dx w.r.t. : tech_ms_pca

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             |            Delta-method
             |      dy/dx   Std. Err.      z    P>|z|     [95% Conf. Interval]
-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------
 tech_ms_pca |   .0572576   .0206221     2.78   0.005      .016839    .0976762
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Probit, DV: Carbon price home now
. quietly: probit price_below_home_now temp_above tech_ms_pca $info_source $orga cops_attended $socioeconomics i.income , vce(robust)

. eststo p2: margins, dydx(tech_ms_pca) post

Average marginal effects                        Number of obs     =        276
Model VCE    : Robust

Expression   : Pr(price_below_home_now), predict()
dy/dx w.r.t. : tech_ms_pca

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             |            Delta-method
             |      dy/dx   Std. Err.      z    P>|z|     [95% Conf. Interval]
-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------
 tech_ms_pca |   .0577999   .0173871     3.32   0.001     .0237219     .091878
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Probit, DV: Carbon price home now
. quietly: probit price_below_home_future temp_above tech_ms_pca $info_source $orga cops_attended $socioeconomics i.income , vce(robust)

. eststo p3: margins, dydx(tech_ms_pca) post

Average marginal effects                        Number of obs     =        276
Model VCE    : Robust

Expression   : Pr(price_below_home_future), predict()
dy/dx w.r.t. : tech_ms_pca

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             |            Delta-method
             |      dy/dx   Std. Err.      z    P>|z|     [95% Conf. Interval]
-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------
 tech_ms_pca |   .0429519   .0206146     2.08   0.037      .002548    .0833558
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Marginsplot
. coefplot(p1, offset(-0.3)) (p2, offset(0)) (p3, offset(.3)), legend(order(3 "Average marginal effect" 1 "95% Confidence interval" 2 "90% Confidence interval") size($legend pt) rows(3) r
> owgap(tiny) pos(6) ring(1) region(fcolor(%40))) title("{bf:c} ", pos(11) span size($head pt))  byopts(compact rows(1)) yline(0, lpattern(dash) lcolor(gs3)) ylabel(-.02(.02).1, labsize($
> xylab pt)) xlab(.7 "Global" 1 "National now" 1.3 "National future", labsize($xylab pt)) ytitle("Estimated impact: Tech. optimism" "and proposing carbon price < 60USD", size($xytitle pt)
> ) grid(none) levels(95 90) ciopts(lwidth(0.8 2)  lcolor(*1 *.3) recast(rcap)) mlabel(cond(@pval<.01, "***", cond(@pval<.05, "**", cond(@pval<.1, "*", "")))) msize(3pt) msymbol(D) mlabsi
> ze(10pt) mlabposition(2) subtitle(, size(9pt) lstyle(none) margin(small) nobox justification(center) alignment(top) bmargin(top)) vertical graphregion(margin(15 2 0 0) fcolor(none) lcol
> or(none)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0)) scale(*1.25) fysize(80) 

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\margins_temp_price", replace

> e", rows(1) fysize(50)
(note:  named style thin not found in class linestyle, default attributes used)

(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia_Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis/results/intermediate/figure1_bc.gph saved)

.

. graph combine "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\tech_opt_answers" "$working_ANALYSIS/results/intermediate/figure1_bc.gph" , rows(2) ysize(5) graphregion(margin(b=0))
(note:  named style thin not found in class linestyle, default attributes used)

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph1.yaxis1.title.DragBy 0 -1       // Graph B: reposition title x-axis

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph1.legend.plotregion1.DragBy 0 9  // Graph B: reposition legend

. 
. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.legend.plotregion1.key[1].DragBy -1 0   // Graph C: Legend key 1 

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.legend.plotregion1.label[1].DragBy -1 0 // Graph C: Legend label 1

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.legend.plotregion1.key[3].DragBy 1 0    // Graph C: Legend key 3

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.legend.plotregion1.label[3].DragBy 1 0  // Graph C: Legend label 3

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.legend.DragBy 1 0 // Graph C: Legend Move

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.xaxis1.major.num_rule_ticks = 0

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.xaxis1.major.num_rule_ticks = 0

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.xaxis1.edit_tick 3 1.3 `""National" "future""', custom tickset(major) editstyle(tickstyle(textstyle(size(2.3))))

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.yoffset = -1.6                 // Graph C: offset y

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.plotregion1.plot8.style.editstyle area(linestyle(color("255 220 184"))) editcopy

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.plotregion1.plot7.style.editstyle area(linestyle(color("255 128 0"))) editcopy

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.plotregion1.plot9.style.editstyle marker(fillcolor("255 128 0")) editcopy

. /*
> Main Body:
> I)  Fig. 1: Descriptives
>         a) Carbon price and temperature rise
>         b) Shifting the burden
> 
> II) Fig. 2: Inferential
>         a) Answers towards technological optimism items
>         b) Technological optimism mindset and temperature & prices suggested
> 
> III) In text-statistics not mentioned in the supplementary online material
>     - "Delegates vastly agree to limit global warming: The majority perceives a rise above 1.5°C unacceptable (78%), with only few (8%) deeming an increase of 2.5°C or more acceptable."
>     - "The median global carbon price recommended in our sample is 50 USD [...]"
>     - "Roughly half of all delegates interviewed stated rather unambitious carbon prices below 60 USD (55%). Only 37% (19% and 13%, respectively) deemed a price of at least 82 USD (185 
> USD, 281 USD) as appropriate"
>     - "This variance in global price suggested is highest for the three low temperature options (0°C, 0.5°C and 1°C), with price suggestions ranging from 0 to 2,000 USD (Levene’s test F
> (1, 275)=21.7, p<0.001)."
>     - "Of the 100 delegates [suggesting prices between 0°C und 1°C] in favor of these ambitious temperature targets, 62% indicated global carbon prices below 60 USD as appropriate to st
> ay below the temperature target."
>     - "In addition, we find that participants who claim to be influential in their delegation score higher on the technological optimism mindset (r=.23, p<.001)."
> */
. 
. 
. 
. global working_ANALYSIS "C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia_Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis"

. 
. 
. // REPLACE WITH _analysis for upload!!
. use "$working_ANALYSIS\data\delegates_analysis_complete.dta", clear

. 
. 
. *---------------------------------------
. *   I) FIGURE 1 
. *------------------------------
. // Figure Settings
. * Text size
. global head     10 // Title

. global legend    8 // Legend

. global xytitle   8 // Axis title

. global xylab     8 // Scale label

. global fysize    22 

. global textsize  14 pt

. 
.

. // Fig 1a: Distribution of answers towards technological optimism items
. ** Catplot for each item
. global margins 145 0 1 3 // set margins for all

. global pos_text1 -15 50

. global pos_text2  50 -4

. 
. mylabels 0(25)100, myscale(@) local(pctlabel) suffix("%") // set label for axis
0 "0%" 25 "25%" 50 "50%" 75 "75%" 100 "100%"

. catplot tech_ms_1 , text($pos_text1 "Future generations will be richer and better equipped to deal" "with adverse impacts of climate change." $pos_text2 "{it:.46}", size($textsize) plac
> e(w) just(right)) stack percent asyvar yla(`pctlabel', nogrid)  title("") bargap(0) blabel(bar, size(medium) format(%9.0f) pos(center)) l1title("")  b1title("") legend(rows(1) pos(6) ri
> ng(1) size(vsmall)) plotregion(margin(zero)) graphregion(margin($margins)) yscale(off) fysize($fysize)

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\fut_opt1", replace

> :.51}", size($textsize) place(w) just(right)) stack percent asyvar yla(`pctlabel', nogrid)  title("") bargap(0) blabel(bar, size(medium) format(%9.0f) pos(center)) l1title("")  b1title(
> "") legend(rows(1) pos(6) ring(1) size(vsmall)) plotregion(margin(zero)) graphregion(margin($margins)) yscale(off) fysize($fysize)

> 2 "{it:.44}", size($textsize) place(w) just(right)) stack percent asyvar yla(`pctlabel', nogrid)  title("") bargap(0) blabel(bar, size(medium) format(%9.0f) pos(center)) l1title("")  b1

> intermediate\fut_opt1" "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\fut_opt5" , cols(1) legendfrom("$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\fut_opt6") title("{bf:a }", size(11 pt) pos(11) rin
> g(15)) graphregion(margin(2 3 -3 0)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0))

. graph export "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\1a_tech_opt_answers.tif", replace
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia_Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis\results\intermediate\1a_tech_opt_answers.tif written in TIFF format
> )

. // Fig 1b
. ** Global carbon price and temperature rise 
. * Global Generate variable defining position of observations on x-axis
. egen carbon_price_rank = rank(carbon_price_cap), by(temp_rise_cropped) unique

. egen temp_rise_cropped_freq = count(carbon_price_cap), by(temp_rise_cropped)

. gen  temp_rise_cropped_jitter2 = temp_rise_cropped + (carbon_price_rank *.006) - (temp_rise_cropped_freq / 2 * 0.006)

. 
. * National: Generate variable defining position of observations on x-axis
. foreach var in now future {
  2. egen price_rank_h_`var' = rank(price_home_`var'_cap), unique
  3. }

. 
. gen h_now_jitter = .
(276 missing values generated)

. replace h_now_jitter = .5 + (price_rank_h_now *.001)
(276 real changes made)

. gen h_future_jitter = .
(276 missing values generated)

. replace h_future_jitter = 1 + (price_rank_h_future * .001)
(276 real changes made)

. gen h_now_stat = .
(276 missing values generated)

. replace h_now_stat = .6
(276 real changes made)

. gen h_future_stat = .
(276 missing values generated)

. replace h_future_stat = 1.1
(276 real changes made)

. 
. 
. * Save number of observations in locals
. forvalues i = 1/6 {
  2. sum ln_carbon_price if tr`i' == 1
  3. local n_`i' = r(N)
  4. }

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         22    3.323065    2.261287          0   7.601402

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         36    3.722019    2.127395   .6931472   7.601402

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         42    4.207788    1.800718   1.098612   7.601402

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |        115    4.116706    1.364998          0   7.313887

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         40    3.659859    1.407166          0   6.552508

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
ln_carbon_~e |         21    3.544467    1.325008   .6931472   6.908755

. twoway ///
> (scatter carbon_price_cap temp_rise_cropped_jitter2 , mcolor(%30) msize(medium) msymbol(o)) ///
> (scatter mean_carbon_price temp_rise_cropped , mcolor("119 94 239") mlcolor("94 64 201")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(triangle))                           ///
> (scatter median_carbon_price temp_rise_cropped , mcolor("220 38 127") mlcolor("208 17 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                           ///
> , title("{bf:b }", pos(11) span size($head pt))                                             ///
> ytitle("Global carbon price to stay below" "stated temperat. target (USD/tCO2)", size($xytitle pt))                               ///
> ylabel(, labsize($xylab pt))                                                                ///
> xtitle("Temperature rise deemed acceptable (°C)", size($xytitle pt)  margin(0 0 0 4))       ///
> xlabel(1 `" "0°C" "(n=`n_1')" "' 2 `" "0.5°C" "(n=`n_2')" "'  3 `" "1°C" "(n=`n_3')" "' 4 `" "1.5°C" "(n=`n_4')" "' 5 `" "2°C" "(n=`n_5')" "' 6 `" "{&ge}2.5°C" "(n=`n_6')" "' , labsize(
> 2.1 pt))                                         ///
> xscale(range(0.85 6.2 )) ///
> legend(order(1 "Observation" 2 "Mean" 3 "Median") size($legend pt) rows(1) pos(6) ring(1) region(fcolor(%40))) ///
> fysize(45) fxsize(40) scale(*1.25) graphregion(margin(0 0 1.3 0) fcolor(none) lcolor(none)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0)) 

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\price_temprise", replace
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia_Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis\results\intermediate\price_temprise.gph saved)

. 
. 
. * National carbon prices home (now/future)
. twoway ///
> (scatter price_home_now_cap h_now_jitter , mcolor(purple%30) msize(medium) msymbol(o))  ///
> (scatter mean_price_home_now h_now_stat , mcolor("119 94 239") mlcolor("94 64 201")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(triangle))                    ///
> (scatter median_price_home_now h_now_stat , mcolor("220 38 127") mlcolor("208 17 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                        ///
> (scatter price_home_future_cap h_future_jitter , mcolor(orange%30) msize(medium) msymbol(o)) ///
> (scatter mean_price_home_future h_future_stat , mcolor("119 94 239") mlcolor("94 64 201")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(triangle))                  ///
> (scatter median_price_home_future h_future_stat , mcolor("220 38 127") mlcolor("208 17 111")  mlwidth(medium) msymbol(square))                  ///
> , title("{bf: }", pos(11) span size($head pt))                                   ///
> ytitle("National carbon price to stay below" "2°C temp. target (USD/tCO2)", size($xytitle pt))            ///
> ylabel(, labsize($xylab pt)) yscale(alt) ///
> xtitle("Time period", size($xytitle pt)  margin(0 0 0 4)) ///
> xlabel(.6 "Now" 1.1 "Future", labsize(8 pt)) xscale(range(0.47 1.3)) ///
> legend(off) ///
> fysize(45) fxsize(20) scale(*1.25) graphregion(margin(6 0 13.3 3.6) fcolor(none) lcolor(none)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0)) nodraw

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\global_price", replace
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia_Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis\results\intermediate\global_price.gph saved)

. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. // Fig. 1c. Marginsplot global carbon price and home carbon price deemed necessary 
. * Set globals
. global info_source info_cc_1 info_cc_2 info_cc_3 info_cc_4 info_cc_5

. global socioeconomics edu1 edu3 edu4 edu5 // Education ref. cat.: edu2 (Social Sciences); gender and age erased to not jepardize anonimity of participants

. global orga orga2 orga3 orga4 // Governmental organization ref. cat.

. global countryspecifics lower_middle_income upper_middle_income high_income // Income level: ref.cat: low

. 
. 
. * Probit, DV: Global carbon price 
. quietly: probit price_below temp_above tech_ms_pca $info_source $orga cops_attended $socioeconomics i.income , vce(robust)

. eststo p1: margins, dydx(tech_ms_pca) post

Average marginal effects                        Number of obs     =        276
Model VCE    : Robust

Expression   : Pr(price_below), predict()
dy/dx w.r.t. : tech_ms_pca

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             |            Delta-method
             |      dy/dx   Std. Err.      z    P>|z|     [95% Conf. Interval]
-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------
 tech_ms_pca |   .0572576   .0206221     2.78   0.005      .016839    .0976762
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Probit, DV: Carbon price home now
. quietly: probit price_below_home_now temp_above tech_ms_pca $info_source $orga cops_attended $socioeconomics i.income , vce(robust)

. eststo p2: margins, dydx(tech_ms_pca) post

Average marginal effects                        Number of obs     =        276
Model VCE    : Robust

Expression   : Pr(price_below_home_now), predict()
dy/dx w.r.t. : tech_ms_pca

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             |            Delta-method
             |      dy/dx   Std. Err.      z    P>|z|     [95% Conf. Interval]
-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------
 tech_ms_pca |   .0577999   .0173871     3.32   0.001     .0237219     .091878
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Probit, DV: Carbon price home now
. quietly: probit price_below_home_future temp_above tech_ms_pca $info_source $orga cops_attended $socioeconomics i.income , vce(robust)

. eststo p3: margins, dydx(tech_ms_pca) post

Average marginal effects                        Number of obs     =        276
Model VCE    : Robust

Expression   : Pr(price_below_home_future), predict()
dy/dx w.r.t. : tech_ms_pca

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             |            Delta-method
             |      dy/dx   Std. Err.      z    P>|z|     [95% Conf. Interval]
-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------
 tech_ms_pca |   .0429519   .0206146     2.08   0.037      .002548    .0833558
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Marginsplot
. coefplot(p1, offset(-0.3)) (p2, offset(0)) (p3, offset(.3)), legend(order(3 "Average marginal effect" 1 "95% Confidence interval" 2 "90% Confidence interval") size($legend pt) rows(3) r
> owgap(tiny) pos(6) ring(1) region(fcolor(%40))) title("{bf:c} ", pos(11) span size($head pt))  byopts(compact rows(1)) yline(0, lpattern(dash) lcolor(gs3)) ylabel(-.02(.02).1, labsize($
> xylab pt)) xlab(.7 "Global" 1 "National now" 1.3 "National future", labsize($xylab pt)) ytitle("Estimated impact: Tech. optimism" "and proposing carbon price < 60USD", size($xytitle pt)
> ) grid(none) levels(95 90) ciopts(lwidth(0.8 2)  lcolor(*1 *.3) recast(rcap)) mlabel(cond(@pval<.01, "***", cond(@pval<.05, "**", cond(@pval<.1, "*", "")))) msize(3pt) msymbol(D) mlabsi
> ze(10pt) mlabposition(2) subtitle(, size(9pt) lstyle(none) margin(small) nobox justification(center) alignment(top) bmargin(top)) vertical graphregion(margin(15 2 0 0) fcolor(none) lcol
> or(none)) plotregion(margin(0 0 0 0)) scale(*1.25) fysize(80) 

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\margins_temp_price", replace 
(file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia_Delegates\8_Submission\NSUST\analysis\results\intermediate\margins_temp_price.gph saved)

> e", rows(1) fysize(50)
(note:  named style thin not found in class linestyle, default attributes used)

. 
. // Combine graph a with b&c
. graph combine "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\tech_opt_answers" "$working_ANALYSIS/results/intermediate/figure1_bc.gph" , rows(2) ysize(5) graphregion(margin(b=0))
(note:  named style thin not found in class linestyle, default attributes used)

. 
. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph2.xaxis1.title.DragBy 1.2 0      // Graph B: reposition title

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph1.yaxis1.title.DragBy 0 -1.6       // Graph B: reposition title x-axis

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph1.legend.plotregion1.DragBy 0 9  // Graph B: reposition legend

. 
. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.legend.plotregion1.key[1].DragBy -1 0   // Graph C: Legend key 1 

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.legend.plotregion1.label[1].DragBy -1 0 // Graph C: Legend label 1

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.legend.plotregion1.key[3].DragBy 1 0    // Graph C: Legend key 3

. gr_edit plotregion1.graph2.plotregion1.graph3.legend.plotregion1.label[3].DragBy 1 0  // Graph C: Legend label 3

. /*
> Main Body:
> I)  Fig. 1: Descriptives
>         a) Carbon price and temperature rise
>         b) Shifting the burden
> 
> II) Fig. 2: Inferential
>         a) Answers towards technological optimism items
>         b) Technological optimism mindset and temperature & prices suggested
> 
> III) In text-statistics not mentioned in the supplementary online material
>     - "Delegates vastly agree to limit global warming: The majority perceives a rise above 1.5°C unacceptable (78%), with only few (8%) deeming an increase of 2.5°C or more acceptable."
>     - "The median global carbon price recommended in our sample is 50 USD [...]"
>     - "Roughly half of all delegates interviewed stated rather unambitious carbon prices below 60 USD (55%). Only 37% (19% and 13%, respectively) deemed a price of at least 82 USD (185 
> USD, 281 USD) as appropriate"
>     - "This variance in global price suggested is highest for the three low temperature options (0°C, 0.5°C and 1°C), with price suggestions ranging from 0 to 2,000 USD (Levene’s test F
> (1, 275)=21.7, p<0.001)."
>     - "Of the 100 delegates [suggesting prices between 0°C und 1°C] in favor of these ambitious temperature targets, 62% indicated global carbon prices below 60 USD as appropriate to st
> ay below the temperature target."
>     - "In addition, we find that participants who claim to be influential in their delegation score higher on the technological optimism mindset (r=.23, p<.001)."
> */
. 
. 
.

. *   I) FIGURE 1

. // Figure Settings
. * Text size
. global head     10 // Title

. global xytitle   8 // Axis title

. global pos_text1 -15 50

. global pos_text2  50 -4

. 
. mylabels 0(25)100, myscale(@) local(pctlabel) suffix("%") // set label for axis
0 "0%" 25 "25%" 50 "50%" 75 "75%" 100 "100%"

. catplot tech_ms_1 , text($pos_text1 "Future generations will be richer and better equipped to deal" "with adverse impacts of climate change." $pos_text2 "{it:.46}", size($textsize) plac
> e(w) just(right)) stack percent asyvar yla(`pctlabel', nogrid)  title("") bargap(0) blabel(bar, size(medium) format(%9.0f) pos(center)) l1title("")  b1title("") legend(rows(1) pos(6) ri
> ng(1) size(vsmall)) plotregion(margin(zero)) graphregion(margin($margins)) yscale(off) fysize($fysize)

. graph save "$working_ANALYSIS\results\intermediate\fut_opt1", replace

> "") legend(rows(1) pos(6) ring(1) size(vsmall)) plotregion(margin(zero)) graphregion(margin($margins)) yscale(off) fysize($fysize)
